channel.title: Stuck in Forget about Freeman
channel.description: I'm at the end of the level after getting through two robot sentries near a hummer. There is a blast door beyond this point with a green button to open it. the problem is when i push the button, instead of it loading the next level, the screen goes black and i get, "unfortunatly black mesa has encountered an error and must close". CRASH! Does any one know how to fix this as i was enjoying this game up to then? :frowning:

item.title: Stuck in Forget about Freeman
item.dc:creator: gregjenk
item.description:
I’m at the end of the level after getting through two robot sentries near a hummer. There is a blast door beyond this point with a green button to open it. the problem is when i push the button, instead of it loading the next level, the screen goes black and i get, “unfortunatly black mesa has encountered an error and must close”. CRASH! Does any one know how to fix this as i was enjoying this game up to then?

Read full topic
